subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ bullpen survived a two-run ninth inning and eventually saved R. A. Dickey’s win, making him the first Mets pitcher since Frank Viola in 1990 to win 20 games.
snippet: The Mets’ bullpen survived a two-run ninth inning and eventually saved R. A. Dickey’s win, making him the first Mets pitcher since Frank Viola in 1990 to win 20 games.
